title: Sample Preparation in Bulk Tissue Samples Using the Arctis Plasma FIB DualBeam to Enable Molecular Imaging
content: The Arctis Plasma FIB DualBeam system is a powerful tool for cellular structure biology, providing optimized capabilities for high-throughput sample preparation. While lamella preparation on plunge-frozen cellular samples has been studied extensively with DualBeams, different challenges are presented with larger, bulk tissue samples prepared by high pressure freezing. Enabling precise and targeted lamella prep on these tissue samples is critical to accessing the information within. With the key advantages of high milling currents, precise and automated lamella preparation and integrated optical imaging, the Arctis cryo DualBeam can solve these challenges efficiently.
